verses.verse: ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Ho, Woe עֲטֶ֤רֶת <WH5850> 'a-Te-ret to the crown גֵּאוּת֙ <WH1348> ge-'Ut of pride שִׁכֹּרֵ֣י <WH7910> shik-ko-Rei to the drunkards אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְצִ֥יץ <WH6731> ve-Tzitz flower נֹבֵ֖ל <WH5034> no-Vel [is] a fading צְבִ֣י <WH6643> tze-Vi whose glorious תִפְאַרְתּ֑וֹ <WH8597> tif-'ar-To; beauty אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is at רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh which [are] on the head גֵּֽיא־ <WH1516> gei- valleys שְׁמָנִ֖ים <WH8081> she-ma-Nim of the fat הֲל֥וּמֵי <WH1986> ha-Lu-mei of them that are overcome יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> Ya-yin. with wine

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> yih-Yeh will become יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh shall the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts לַעֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> la-'a-Te-ret be for a crown צְבִ֔י <WH6643> tze-Vi, of glory וְלִצְפִירַ֖ת <WH6843> ve-litz-fi-Rat and for a diadem תִּפְאָרָ֑ה <WH8597> tif-'a-Rah; of beauty לִשְׁאָ֖ר <WH7605> lish-'Ar unto the residue עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> am-Mo. of his people

[in] judgment
